content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Based on the location and the condition of the apartment, I believe a fair price would be 700 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. How about 650 Euros per month? This is a very competitive price considering the amenities and the location.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the apartment is worth more than what you're offering. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mister Schmidt. Let's meet in the middle. How about 675 Euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, I think.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we can still do better than meeting in the middle. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your insistence, Mister Schmidt. How about 685 Euros per month? This is closer to your initial asking price and reflects the quality of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I still believe we can get a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your dedication to getting the best price, Mister Schmidt. Let's try 695 Euros per month. This is very close to your initial offer and I believe it's a generous compromise.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
